duties_responsibilities.duty: Handling customer service inquiries and problems via telephone, email, and chat.
Obtaining and evaluating all relevant data to handle complaints and inquiries.
Directing requests and unresolved issues to the designated resource.
Keeping records of customer interactions and transactions.
Recording details of inquiries, comments, complaints, and actions taken.
Managing administration, communicating with internal departments, and providing feedback on the efficiency of the customer service process.
